apex.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the top or highest part of something pointed or curved
apex.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the most important position in an organization or society
apex.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: The king was at the apex of society.
apex.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: the most successful part of something
apex.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: He was at the apex of his career.
